p: In recent years, molecular docking simulations have become an important tool for understanding the interaction mode and the structure-activity relationships of ligands with receptors. The in silico research results of compounds 1 and 2 were in agreement with the IC 50 data and the enzyme kinetic study in vitro. The integration of enzyme activity, kinetics, and molecular docking studies provided principle insights into the molecular basis underlying ligand binding affinity and Î±-glucosidase inhibition.
